forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming a steady light rain during the afternoon hours. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow diminishing in the morning. Partial clearing in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with snow developing later during the night. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies with snow developing later during the night. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 26F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around -5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 21F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers developing after midnight. Low 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High around 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the day progresses. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers becoming mixed with rain later. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early will give way to a mixture of rain and snow showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening will become intermittent in the overnight hours. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 33F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few rain showers early mixing with snow showers later in the day. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a mixture of light rain and snow developing in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.
